resources.name: 1. Create Document (Path Auto-Resolve)
resources.description: Create document with path - automatically creates 'Characters' folder if it doesn't exist

resources.name: 2. Create Root Document
resources.description: Create a document at root level (no folder)

resources.name: 3. Get Document by ID
resources.description: Get a specific document by ID (with full content)

resources.name: 4. Update Document Content
resources.description: Update the content of a document (name and folder stay the same)

resources.name: 5. Rename Document
resources.description: Change the name of a document (stays in same folder)

resources.name: 6. Move Document to Folder
resources.description: Move root document into a folder (uses folder_id from environment)

resources.name: 7. Move Document to Root
resources.description: Move document to root level (set folder_id to empty string)

resources.name: 8. [VALIDATION] Rename Document with Slash
resources.description: Should succeed: document names CAN contain slashes (unlike folders)
